text: Coffee Crisp is a chocolate bar made by Nestlé. It is made of coffee flavored candy in between vanilla wafers and covered with milk chocolate. It was first made by Rowntree's in Canada in 1932. The Canadian Rowntree's factory was bought by Nestlé in 1988. == References == ==Other websites== *Official website Category:Chocolate bars Category:Nestlé
title: Coffee Crisp
